title: Life's Punchline
overview: A story of 5 people in their late 20's.Haruto Takaiwa, Shunta Asabuki and Junpei Minowa are members of unpopular comedy trio Macbeth. They always gather at a family restaurant where Rihoko Nakahama Â works as a waitress. Tsumugi Nakahama is Rihoko Nakahama's younger sister.
